email_body: The method for distribution of the weekly reports has changed. Hard copies will now be distributed through your administrative assistant. To receive a paper copy of the report, please send me an e-mail request including you location and admin. The information in these reports is for internal use only and should not be the basis for investment decisions. Please let me know if you have any questions or comments, James Bruce Enron North America (503) 464-8122 West Power Desk (503) 860-8612 (c) 121 SW Salmon, 3WTC0306 (503) 464-3740 (fax) Portland, OR 97204 James.Bruce@Enron.com
